original_text: You are not being wise in the way that God wants you to be wise. Instead, you are thinking like people who do not know God. Your thoughts do not come from God's Spirit. They come from demons.
korean_text: 이러한 지혜는 위로부터 내려온 것이 아니요 땅 위의 것이요 정욕의 것이요 귀신의 것이니

sentences.original_text: in the way that God wants you to be wise
like people who do not know God
Your thoughts do not come from God's Spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 생각은 하나님의 영에서 오지 않습니다
